column1: Table 5.4 Distribution of Contributory Factors - Child KSI Accidents, for the Years 2010 to 2012

column2: Crossed road masked by stationary or parked vehicle
Failed to judge vehicle's path or speed
Pedestrian - Dangerous action in carriageway (eg playing)
Driver/Rider failed to judge other person's path or speed
Pedestrian - Wrong use of pedestrian crossing facility
Pedestrian wearing dark clothing at night
Disobeyed Give Way or Stop sign or markings
Illegal turn or direction of travel
Passing too close to cyclist, horse rider or pedestrian
Driver/Rider - Illness or disability, mental or physical
Pedestrian impaired by drugs (illicit or medicinal)
Traffic calming (eg speed cushions, road humps, chicanes)
Road layout (eg bend, hill, narrow carriageway)
Tyres illegal, defective or under inflated
Not displaying lights at night or in poor visibility
Pedestrian - Disability or illness, mental or physical
